artist: Designer: Larsen Design Studio, New York; Producer: Jack Lenor Larsen, Inc.
description: Plain weave with supplimentary weft and warp of 4 yarns forming 3/4 " squares. Pattern repeat 6" horizontal by 6 1/2 " vertical, hemmed at both ends. Plain weave with supplimentary weft and warp of 4 yarns forming 3/4 " squares. Pattern repeat 6" horizontal by 6 1/2 " vertical, hemmed at both ends. (Red/Orange)
image_copyright: © Jack Lenor Larsen%2C Inc.%2C Larsen Design Studio
text: The design studio worked with a number of important architects and space designers, including I. M. Pei, Louis Kahn, and the firm Skidmore, Owings and Merrill. The studio’s work with architect Edward Larrabee Barnes began with a project for Pan American Airlines and later included the creation of this auditorium curtain for the Christian Theological seminary in Indianapolis.
title: SheltonTheater Curtain
